subject: Belmont Stakes
Horse Racing
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
lead_paragraph: Cot Campbell took a chance on the trainer Todd Pletcher in 1996, and the decision paid off Saturday when Palace Malice, owned by Dogwood Stable and trained by Pletcher, won the Belmont.
snippet: Cot Campbell took a chance on the trainer Todd Pletcher in 1996, and the decision paid off Saturday when Palace Malice, owned by Dogwood Stable and trained by Pletcher, won the Belmont.
